text.value: @concat('update erp.COPMB set MB001 = trim(MB001),MB002 = trim(MB002),MB003 = trim(MB003),MB004 = trim(MB004),MB017 = trim(MB017) ',' where convert(varchar, ETL_DATE, 112) >= convert(varchar, getdate()-1, 112)')

@concat('update erp.COPMC set MC001 = trim(MC001),MC002 = trim(MC002),MC003 = trim(MC003),MC004 = trim(MC004),MC009 = trim(MC009) ',' where convert(varchar, ETL_DATE, 112) >= convert(varchar, getdate()-1, 112)')
@concat('update erp.COPMA set MA001 = trim(MA001)',' where convert(varchar, ETL_DATE, 112) >= convert(varchar, getdate()-1, 112)')
